callsignSection.title: Callsign
callsignSection.intro: We use your callsign in-game and in the community. Please read the rules below before submitting.

callsignRules.title: Callsign rules
callsignRules.allowedChars: Allowed characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9 and underscore (_). No spaces.
callsignRules.uniqueness: Must be unique and not confusingly similar to existing callsigns (exact match and sound/look match). Examples: Ghost vs G0st; Nikolai vs Nikolay; Alexey vs Aleksei.
callsignRules.neutral: Must not be political, religious, or advertising/brand-related.
callsignRules.noProjectSquads: Must not match existing squad names on the project.
callsignRules.noRealUnits: Must not reference real-world military units. Examples: 101st Airborne, 1st Marines, VDV, Spetsnaz.
callsignRules.noEquipment: Must not be real equipment/vehicles/weapons. Examples: AK-74, M4A1, BMP-2, Apache, Mi-24.
callsignRules.keepSimple: Keep it short and readable (ideally 1-2 words). Avoid long multi-word phrases.
callsignRules.adminNote: Even if the callsign is not perfect, the application may still be approved - but administrators can ask you to change it later.

callsignCheck.note: This is a helper check - admins make the final decision.

welcome.aboutP1: Triad Tactics is an Arma Reforger project focused on immersive, teamwork-driven military operations inside the game. Our goal is to deliver sessions that feel structured and believable: carefully prepared scenarios, authentic loadouts, vehicles, and a environment.
welcome.aboutP2: The server is created and maintained by Triad Team. We welcome players from all over the world - we’ll help you get settled and feel at home in our community.

highlights.1: Mission scenarios with an emphasis on tactics and coordination
highlights.2: Period-appropriate gear and vehicles for each scenario
highlights.3: Friendly community and support for new players

welcome.gallerySubtitle: A few moments from our sessions
welcome.disclaimerText: Triad Tactics is a gaming project within Arma Reforger. We do not support, promote, or justify real-world war, violence, or hatred, and we do not create missions that depict ongoing real-world conflicts.
